fields.name: Suspicious
fields.description: Asset is suspicious and should be analyzed

fields.name: Requested
fields.description: Asset is requested for further analysis

fields.name: Open
fields.description: Incident is open and investigations are running

fields.name: Closed
fields.description: Incident is closed and all investigations are finished

fields.name: Exercise/Network Defense Testing
fields.description: This category is used during state, federal, national, international exercises and approved activity testing of internal/external network defenses or responses.

fields.name: Unauthorized Access
fields.description: In this category an individual gains logical or physical access without permission to a federal agency network, system, application, data, or other resource.

fields.name: Denial of Service
fields.description: An attack that successfully prevents or impairs the normal authorized functionality of networks, systems or applications by exhausting resources. This activity includes being the victim or participating in the DoS.

fields.name: Malicious Code
fields.description: Installation of malicious software (e.g., virus, worm, Trojan horse, or other code-based malicious entity) that infects an operating system or application. Agencies are NOT required to report malicious logic that has been successfully quarantined by antivirus (AV) software.

fields.name: Improper Usage
fields.description: A person violates acceptable computing use policies.

fields.name: Scans/Probes/Attempted Access
fields.description: This category includes any activity that seeks to access or identify a federal agency computer, open ports, protocols, service, or any combination for later exploit. This activity does not directly result in a compromise or denial of service.

fields.name: Investigation
fields.description: Unconfirmed incidents that are potentially malicious or anomalous activity deemed by the reporting entity to warrant further review.

fields.name: Breach/APT
fields.description: This category includes major breaches of IT infrastructure as performed by APTs or state sponsored attacks.

fields.name: Phishing/Scam/Spam
fields.description: This category includes all incidents related to phishing, scam, or spam emails.

fields.name: Reinstall System(s)
fields.description: Initiate reinstallation of affected assets (e.g. because of compromise).

fields.name: Forensic Copy
fields.description: Create forensically sound images of affected assets.

fields.name: Collect Logfiles
fields.description: Collect specific log files from affected assets.
